titleStmt.title: The practical method of the penny-post being a sheet very necessary for all persons to have by them ... : With an explaination [sic] of the following stamps for the marking of all letters.
titleStmt.author: Dockwra, William, d. 1716.

notesStmt.note: Author's name from first lines of text.
Reproduction of original in: Christ Church (University of Oxford). Library.
Item at reel 2645 with: The penny post of London. London : Printed by Tho. James ..., 1682.
